name: PYTHON Adapter
content:
# Python Adapter

**Style & Typing**
- PEP 8 style; PEP 257 docstrings; prefer type hints; dataclasses for simple data containers; prefer pure functions and explicit dependencies.

**Testing**
- `pytest` with fixtures/parametrize; avoid real network/disk I/O; use `tmp_path`/`monkeypatch`; deterministic seeds.

**Formatting / Lint / Types**
- `ruff check --fix`, `ruff format` (or `black`), `mypy` (strict on touched modules).

**Runbook**
```
ruff check . --fix
ruff format .
mypy .
pytest -q
```

**Security & Performance**
- Validate inputs; avoid eval/exec; be careful with YAML/JSON loaders; use timeouts for network I/O.
- Profile with `cProfile`/`py-spy` when relevant.

**References**
- PEP 8 — https://peps.python.org/pep-0008/
- Pytest docs — https://docs.pytest.org/
- Mypy docs — https://mypy.readthedocs.io/
